ComicInfo.Summary:
When Julie Martin becomes exposed to the fallout of a new, hi-tech weapon she seeks help, but instead finds she's become the target of a military contractor. The people she once depended upon either cannot or will not help. Don't miss this second chapter of the exciting new series from SiP creator Terry Moore!
Julie heads out of the house and the simple act of touching her truck sends the beads all over it racing onto her body and increase the area the suit now covers. She goes to the hospital but the doctor takes it for a joke and dismisses her. Leaving she has a frightening encounter with a homeless stranger in the car-park. Her husband calls wanting the divorce papers signed and doesn't want to know about her problem.
Jack briefs them in HENRI that two people were in the area and might account for the missing 77% of the suit.
Elsewhere a woman named Ivy is called up into action for the company and she flies off in her private twin prop to meet Jack.
